item.title: Git Learnin
item.description: gitlearnin More and more I’m working with non-dev resources that are now needing to learn Git. The following is a quick and dirty guide I threw together to share with people that could use a quick git primer. Initial Setup https://git-scm.com/downloads Check the current settings git config --global --list Note: You can also use –local to see the settings for a given repository, or leave it off to see ALL settings relevant to the current repository (global and local)
